content: The attacker (81.49.200.166) connects to a vulnerable Nginx server and obtains a shell. Through the shell, the attacker successfully downloads a malicious payload to /tmp/vUgefal and executes the payload with root privileges. The elevated process vUgefal attempts to move laterally to 154.145.113.18 and 61.167.39.128. However, only the attempt at infecting 61.167.39.128 is successful. vUgefal further plans to inject malicious payload to the sshd process. To do so, the attacker downloads the payload to /var/log/devc, but the attempted process injection fails.
relationship:
1. [CoT]: The attacker (81.49.200.166) connects to the Nginx server, which is a socket entity. [Relationships]: <process:81.49.200.166,connect,socket:Nginx server>. 
2. [CoT]: The attacker obtains a shell from the Nginx server, which is a process entity. [Relationships]: <process:81.49.200.166,obtains,process:Nginx server>. 
3. [CoT]: The attacker downloads a malicious payload to /tmp/vUgefal, which is a file entity. [Relationships]: <process:81.49.200.166,downloads,file:/tmp/vUgefal>. 
4. [CoT]: The attacker executes the payload with root privileges, which is a process entity. [Relationships]: <process:81.49.200.166,executes,process:vUgefal>. 
5. [CoT]: The elevated process vUgefal attempts to move laterally to 154.145.113.18, which is a socket entity. [Relationships]: <process:vUgefal,attempts to move laterally to,socket:154.145.113.18>. 
6. [CoT]: The elevated process vUgefal attempts to move laterally to 61.167.39.128, which is a socket entity. [Relationships]: <process:vUgefal,attempts to move laterally to,socket:61.167.39.128>. 
7. [CoT]: vUgefal plans to inject malicious payload to the sshd process, which is a process entity. [Relationships]: <process:vUgefal,injects,process:sshd>. 
8. [CoT]: The attacker downloads the payload to /var/log/devc, which is a file entity. [Relationships]: <process:81.49.200.166,downloads,file:/var/log/devc>.
